EmailTemplate.name: Extension - NOA Deadline Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Extension - NOA Deadline Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for using Legalzoom.
Based on the US Patent and Trademark Office's (USPTO) website, your Notice of Allowance was issued on xDATEx. Please note you have six months from the date your Notice of Allowance was issued to either file a Statement of Use or Statement of Use Extension application.
Please reply to this email and indicate if you would like to proceed with filing your Statement of Use Extension at this time.
Please note you must continue to file a new request every six months calculated from the issue date of the Notice of Allowance until the Statement of Use is filed. Applicant may file a total of five (5) extension requests. Failure to file a required document during the appropriate time period will result in the abandonment of your trademark application
If you are currently using your mark in commerce in the manner described in the trademark application, please reply to this email for information on how to order a Statement of Use application.
Please note that LegalZoom's policy allows you 60 days from the time of purchase to request a refund for an unfiled application. If you would like to refer to this policy, please visit the link below: https://www.legalzoom.com/satisfaction-guarantee.html.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Best regards,
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
